THUMBNAIL-TITLE RELATIONSHIP.Visual reinforcement: The thumbnail's main text ('Vaginal Dryness: Solved!') closely parallels and visually reinforces the video title's focus on solving vaginal atrophy. The excited, confident expression and doctor's attire further communicate solution and authority, in line with the medical procedures mentioned in the title.
THUMBNAIL-TITLE RELATIONSHIP.Contrasts or mismatches: The thumbnail text refers to 'vaginal dryness', while the title specifically mentions 'vaginal atrophy' and two medical procedures (MonaLisa and Thermiva), which are not visually referenced. The subtitle 'UROGENITAL ATROPHY' partially bridges this gap, but the specific treatments are not pictured or mentioned in the thumbnail.
